description: The Klipsch GiG is an ultra-portable wireless music system small enough to fit into a briefcase, a backpack, or even the palm of your hand. Yet, its full-range sound is what is truly astounding. Applying our 65 years+ experience as a major manufacturer of premium quality loudspeakers to the smallest of the Klipsch Music Center series, GiG is the state-of-the-art choice in its class.
title: Klipsch GiG Black Portable Speaker, Black
